Text:
How do I get the volume to play?  I use VLC.  I'm not sure what the par2 files are for.  Does it have anything to do with the volume?  I tried a "par2 v Casablanca.1942.BD.REMUX.h264.1080P.DHD.Mysilu.ts.par2" but that didn't do anything.  I'm doing something wrong but I don't know what.

Signed, Newbie.
Please use WINRAR to extract all PAR2 files and there you go. ENJOY.
